name: Hunt Down The Phantasm
description:
Everyone has their own phantasms... What are yours?

A very spooookkyy piece of interactive fiction by Drewboo.

A submission for the "I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story" game jam.

Exciting Features:

  • Roughly 7500 words!
  • Five fleshed out endings!
  • Challenging puzzles! (it's just the one puzzle actually)
  • Serious spooks!
  • Possibly a duck!

P.S. this game plays better in full-screen!
